name: Mazey Platformer
description:
Hey guys!

I know that I haven't been uploading for some time now, but that's because I was developing a game.

Anyway, this game is called "Mazey Platformer" as this game involves 3dmazes that you have to solve, but it also has some platforming as you have to parkour your way to the finish!

The game is available for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

If you have any ideas for the game, feel free to drop a comment with the feature you want to add!

if you aren't comfortable sending your suggestion here, then consider sending a dm to ⭐MST_Creator⭐#5927.

Until then,

Stay Safe!
